com.vmware.vapi.client.exception

Class ClientException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.vmware.vapi.client.exception.ClientException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BindingsException, InternalClientException, MessageProtocolException, TransportProtocolException

    public class ClientException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Signals that an exception has occurred in the vAPI client. This class is the base of the client exception hierarchy. The clients may handle general client exception by catching this class or a specific type of exception by catching subclass of the exception.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
